channel.title: [New Source + Content] Ruinous | Perfect Switches | All Animations | Chaotics |
channel.description:
[ul]Welcome to [b][i]Ruinous[/i][/b]
Visit our homepage @ : [url=http://www.ruinousrs.com]http://www.ruinousrs.com[/url]
[b]UPDATE:[/b] Today only! We are giving out a [i]free[/i] [b][u]Chaotic Item[/u][/b] of your choice to first 25 players! Come get yours quickly!
We are proud to have many features: [list] [li]24\7 Uptime [5GB VPS Hosted][/li] [li]Active Staff Team[/li] [li]Perfect Switches in Combat, no lag![/li] [li]No Rollbacks or Disconnections randomly[/li] [li]All Animations and Shops Load[/li] [li]Duel Arena 100% Functional[/li] [li]Fight Pits 100% Functional[/li] [li]Pest Control 100% Functional[/li] [li]Fully-working Barrows![/li] [li][i]and much more[/i]![/li][/list]
Please check us out today @ : [url=http://www.ruinousrs.com]www.ruinousrs.com[/url]
Here are some in-game pictures of our stuff
Pest Control: [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/16lw6et.png[/img] Corp. Beast w/ loaded Maps + Drops [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/23rpzk4.png[/img] Ice Barrage + anims [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/1hq8pg.png[/img]
All Bosses (incl. Nomad) [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/j6k4fr.png[/img][/ul]
